titleStmt.title: Tvvo sermons preached before his Maiestie, in his chappell at Whitehall the one, the xi. of Februarie, the other the xxv. of same moneth. By Richard Meredeth, one of his Maiesties chaplaines in ordinarie.
titleStmt.author: Meredeth, Richard, 1559-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
